PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.application
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Application Framework (see documentation).

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.jaco
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: JACO - Java Access to C++ Objects, a tool to generate the JNI layer.
PACKAGE.STATUS: Frozen, outside application may be better.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.preview
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Package for previewing new classes.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.swing
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Extensions to swing which are not in Sun's swing package.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.util
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Generic utility classes for FreeHEP.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.util.commanddispatcher
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Dispatcher of commands in a complex application.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.util.commandline
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: CommandLine parses a command line for parameters and options.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.util.images
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Image handler to (pre-)load images and icons.

PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Set of Streams, Readers, Writers, Encoders and Decoders.

PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Parameter Database (in memory) to store and retrieve application wide values of different types.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.util.template
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: A simple template engine.

PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: The XMLIO package is a set of interfaces and classes to save and restore objects using XML.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.xml.util
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: XML Utilities to add in reading and writing XML.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.demo.graphics
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Demo Application to show the export capabilities of the Graphics2D and GraphicsIO library of FreeHEP.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.demo.iconbrowser
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Demo Application to browse and explore Icons.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.graphics2d
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Base classes for VectorGraphics, useful to implement different output formats.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.graphics2d.font
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Font encoding tables and lookup classes to query the tables.
PACKAGE.STATUS: Stable, but may change a bit for performance reasons.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.graphics3d
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Interactive 3D graphics engine which can either use plain Java or OpenGL.

PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: EMF, Enhanced Meta File, Input and Output Format.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.graphicsio.exportchooser
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Export dialogs/choosers for GraphicsIO, allowing the user to pick a file and format.
PACKAGE.STATUS: Stable, but option box needs reorganization.

PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: General Java3D extensions (solids and utilities).

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.tools.doclet
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: A modified Standard doclet (from JDK 1.4.2), which includes links to the source code in the generated documentation.
PACKAGE.STATUS: compilable only with jdk 1.4.2, runnable with jdk 1.4.0 and up, not runnable below.

PACKAGE.NAME: org.freehep.tools.servlet
PACKAGE.DESCRIPTION: Servlets intended primarily for use with the FreeHEP web site.
